shows.title: There Is No Planet B: A Handbook for the Make or Break Years
shows.desc:
Feeding the world, climate change, biodiversity, antibiotics, plastics, inequality, fake news – the list of concerns for the Anthropocene seems endless. Mike Berners-Lee explores how the big picture fits together, thinks practically and asks what on Earth should we do?

Mike Berners-Lee is a sustainability expert, professor at Lancaster University and the author of three acclaimed books.
